forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
